page.title: 18A DAY IN THE LIFE OF JOEL
page.content: Monday. I wake up at7.30 and get washed.I put on my uniform and check my school bag.Then I feed the cat and talk to my mum. At 8 o'clock I walk to school (40 mins!). In my tutorial I do my homework or mess about. After registration we go to assembly and then onto a double period of CDT (craft ,design and technology) which I enjoy. A single period is 45 mins. Then we have a 20 minute break and we play football,fight or mess about. Next is double games ; football,rugby, cricket,athletics or softball. After lunch (1 hour) we have language and communication followed by maths (yuk). At 3.25 we are registered and leave school at 3.40. At home I get changed and I might play football followed by dinner.Then it is homework (3 subjects a night). I watch T.V and go to bed at 9.30. {BY JOEL MARTIN AGED 13. }
